properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 8 at 2:42PM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW POSSIBLE FOR FRIDAY...

.A potent winter storm will move into the Inland Northwest Friday.
Light snow will begin in the morning hours on Friday with the
potential for heavy snow Friday afternoon and night.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to
18 inches possible.

* WHERE...Sandpoint, Bonners Ferry, Priest River, Eastport, and
Schweitzer Mountain Road.

* WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas
of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The
hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON
